review_blob: What a wonderful follow-up to the Cave Creeks Chili Beer!!  This beer has a rich dark flavor.  At first the taste can be a little overwhelming.  Once my curiosity of what the many ingrediants were settled, I really enjoyed this beer.

As a new member of ratebeer, Im optimistic that my further reviews can only get better.  I enjoy spicy food and even spicy cocktails, but this is a beer that only belongs in fraternity hazing.  I managed to take a medium sized sip before pouring the rest down the drain.  I didnt find the spicy quality of the beer to be overbearing.  But instead it was the horrible vinegar/chili flavor that sealed the deal.
